text: Naveen Polishetty is an Indian actor who works in Telugu and Hindi language films. He is notable for his roles in Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya (2019) and Chhichhore (2019). == Early life and career == Polishetty was born in Hyderabad. He started out his career as an engineer after graduating from Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology before becoming a theatre actor. He then became popular after acting in YouTube videos by All India Bakchod. In 2019, he played the lead in detective comedy thriller Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya, which he co-wrote. He then made his Bollywood debut in Chhichhore alongside Sushant Singh Rajput and Shraddha Kapoor. Both the films performed very well at box office. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable |- !Year ! Film ! Role ! Language !
